actions.description: The salamander makes one Bite attack and four Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) cold damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The salamander exhales chill wind in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Freezing Breath (Recharge 6)

specialTraits.description:
When the salamander takes fire damage, its

Freezing Breath automatically recharges.
specialTraits.name: Burning Fury
